label: Urban Ecology
description: Examines cities as natural systems, combining ecological analyses with historical, anthropological, and sociological studies of urban nature. Addresses ecological sustainability, growth management, biodiversity, restoration, and environmental justice. Required field trip. Same as ENVS 406. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours.
courseSectionInformation: Same as ENVS 406. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours.
